metas.name: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
metas.description: Similar to Thor: Ragnarok, this Marvel film offers a fantastic blend of humor, action, and a killer soundtrack, creating a truly fun space adventure with a lovable band of misfits.

metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
metas.description: This animated masterpiece is incredibly inventive, visually stunning, and packed with humor and heart, fitting the user's enjoyment of fun action and unique storytelling like KPop Demon Hunters.

metas.name: Hot Fuzz (2007)
metas.description: From the same team as 'Shaun of the Dead', this action-comedy is a masterclass in witty dialogue, over-the-top action, and clever satire, appealing to the user's love for fun action and comedy.

metas.name: Knives Out (2019)
metas.description: A stylish and witty modern whodunit with a fantastic cast and sharp humor. It's a fun mystery with enough twists to keep you engaged, akin to the playful nature of 'Ace Ventura' and 'Get Shorty'.

metas.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off (1986)
metas.description: An iconic comedy about skipping school. It's endlessly quotable, fun, and celebrates youthful rebellion with a light touch.

metas.name: About Time (2013)
metas.description: A charming and romantic film with a sci-fi twist (time travel) that focuses on life's simple joys and relationships. It's incredibly heartwarming and uplifting.

metas.name: Palm Springs (2020)
metas.description: A smart and funny sci-fi rom-com that puts a fresh spin on the 'time loop' concept. It's witty, romantic, and surprisingly profound.

metas.name: Amelie (2001)
metas.description: A whimsical and visually stunning French film about a waitress in Paris who decides to spread joy. It's a charming, romantic, and deeply feel-good experience.

metas.name: Doctor Strange (2016)
metas.description: Another Marvel entry that combines impressive visual effects and action with humor and a compelling story, aligning with the user's enjoyment of films like 'Thor: Ragnarok'.

metas.name: Kick-Ass (2010)
metas.description: A darkly comedic superhero action film that's hyper-violent but also incredibly fun and energetic, with a punk rock attitude. It’s a more adult take on fun action heroes.
